step.cmd: Open a command prompt and navigate to <WebLogic Install directory>/<domain_repository>/<DomainName> directory, (e.g. C:/Weblogic/user_projects/domains/<domain_name>). Execute the command startWeblogic from this directory. When the server has started correctly the following line should be displayed: <Server started in RUNNING mode> in the log file, which was configured previously in or in the command prompt if it's not already configured.
To open the Administration Console, the following URL should be opened in a web browser:
Login with the username and password configured during installation (e.g. weblogic / weblogic1).
